local_intent: Re-detect and re-align to the T-block, then execute the secondary orthogonal push (0.1 m at 90 deg) and verify visibility.
assumptions: Tool yaw is already set to 90 deg from earlier global steps
Block remains pushable and workspace is clear
coherence_with_global: Matches the second Push stage after initial push and before target alignment; retains perception retry, re-approach, specified push params, and a minimal post-check.
